sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for August 7 - 8

day: Bridge Deck Overlay Work for I-75S at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
event: Currently in progress thru Labor Day weekend - 6 a.m. thru midnight each weekday:  Two lanes will be closed and two lanes will remain open (including the shoulder).

day: Bridge Deck Overlay Work for I-75S at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
event: Speed limit will be reduced to 55 mph.  Motorists can expect delays in this area.
